name: CommandReconnect
description:
draw2d.command.CommandReconnect

Reconnects two ports. This command is used during the DragDrop operation of a draw2d.Connection.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Create a new Command objects which can be execute via the CommandStack.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: the related Connection which is currently in the drag&drop operation

functions.name: canExecute
functions.description:
Returns [true] if the command can be execute and the execution of the command modify the model. A CommandMove with [startX,startX] == [endX,endY] should return false.
the execution of the Command doesn't modify the model.

functions.name: setNewPorts
functions.description: The new ports to use during the execute of this command.

functions.name: updatePosition
functions.description: compatibily method to the CommandMoveVertex to handle Line and Connections transparent in the ResizeHandles

functions.name: redo
functions.description: Redo the command after the user has undo this command

functions.name: getLabel
functions.description: Returns a label of the Command. e.g. move figure.
